creator: Jocelyn Yang
title: Crypto Markets Today: Binance a Target of Federal Probe
dc:creator: Jocelyn Yang
content: Industry woes widened on Monday with a Reuters report that  U.S. prosecutors are considering criminal charges against Binance and individual senior executives, including CEO Changpeng Zhao. Crypto Markets Today is CoinDesk’s daily newsletter diving into what happened in today's crypto markets.
contentSnippet: Industry woes widened on Monday with a Reuters report that  U.S. prosecutors are considering criminal charges against Binance and individual senior executives, including CEO Changpeng Zhao. Crypto Markets Today is CoinDesk’s daily newsletter diving into what happened in today's crypto markets.

creator: Sage D. Young
title: Polygon’s NFT Market Demonstrates Signs of Significant Increased Adoption, but Not Growth in Sale Volume, Nansen Data Shows
dc:creator: Sage D. Young
content: Amid a crypto winter exacerbated by the FTX fallout, first-time and returning buyers have reached all-time highs in Polygon’s non-fungible token market. Yet, sales volumes are near all-time lows.
contentSnippet: Amid a crypto winter exacerbated by the FTX fallout, first-time and returning buyers have reached all-time highs in Polygon’s non-fungible token market. Yet, sales volumes are near all-time lows.

creator: Jesse Hamilton
title: US Senators Rebuke Sam Bankman-Fried for Refusing Invitations to Testify
dc:creator: Jesse Hamilton
content: Former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Friend has rebuffed attempts from the top members of the Senate Banking Committee to get him to testify, despite a willingness to participate in several other interviews and a similar hearing in the House of Representatives.
contentSnippet: Former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Friend has rebuffed attempts from the top members of the Senate Banking Committee to get him to testify, despite a willingness to participate in several other interviews and a similar hearing in the House of Representatives.

creator: Nikhilesh De
title: FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Fried Arrested, Bahamas Says
dc:creator: Nikhilesh De
content: The Royal Bahamas Police Force arrested FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried, a press statement said.
contentSnippet: The Royal Bahamas Police Force arrested FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried, a press statement said.

creator: Cointelegraph By  Tom Blackstone
title: 13% of Americans have now held crypto: JPMorgan research
dc:creator: Cointelegraph By  Tom Blackstone
content: The JPMorgan report is based on a study of cash transfers from banks to crypto accounts for over 5 million customers.
contentSnippet: The JPMorgan report is based on a study of cash transfers from banks to crypto accounts for over 5 million customers.

creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
title: Breaking: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried arrested and in custody
dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
content: Royal Bahamas police have arrested SBF at the request of the U.S. government, based on a sealed indictment.
contentSnippet: Royal Bahamas police have arrested SBF at the request of the U.S. government, based on a sealed indictment.

creator: Guillermo Jimenez
title: FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Fried Arrested in Bahamas
dc:creator: Guillermo Jimenez
content: The arrest "followed receipt of formal notification from the United States that it has filed criminal charges against SBF," the police statement said.
contentSnippet: The arrest "followed receipt of formal notification from the United States that it has filed criminal charges against SBF," the police statement said.
